meanings.definition: A person who oversees or manages an organization or activity.
meanings.sent1: The school superintendent ensures that all students are safe and learning.
meanings.sent2: The superintendent of the construction site made sure everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The superintendent organized a fun staff retreat to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: She was the superintendent of the dance floor, orchestrating every move.
meanings.sent5: The superintendent's presence was felt in every corner of the event.

meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of maintenance and repairs in a building or facility.
meanings.sent1: The building superintendent fixed the leaky faucet in no time.
meanings.sent2: Our apartment superintendent is always quick to respond to repair requests.
meanings.sent3: The superintendent joked that he had a magic tool belt that fixed everything.
meanings.sent4: She was the superintendent of cleanliness, ensuring every corner sparkled.
meanings.sent5: The superintendent's toolbox held the key to a well-maintained building.
